description: Creates a conditional forwarder associated with your Amazon Web Services directory. Conditional forwarders are required in order to set up a trust relationship with another domain. The conditional forwarder points to the trusted domain.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The directory ID of the Amazon Web Services directory for which you are creating the conditional forwarder.

parameters.name: RemoteDomainName
parameters.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the remote domain with which you will set up a trust relationship.

parameters.name: DnsIpAddrs
parameters.description: The IP addresses of the remote DNS server associated with RemoteDomainName. (string) ---
